name: End of Daylight (EasternMouse)
description:
[Downloading game recommended, html5 build may fail to see keyboard inputs, if you click off the window during play]

Where there is beginning - there is end.

Survive for the longest time!

Made solo in 3 days for Touhou Fan Game Jam 7

Choosen song: End of Daylight

Controls: 
  • WASD: Move
  • Mouse: Aim
  • Left click: Shoot
  • 1, 2, 3: Change Weapons
  • Alt + Enter: Fullscreen
